message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I still believe $10,000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope this revised counteroffer meets your expectations.
